Description:
Detects DNS queries to "ufile.io", which was seen abused by malware and threat actors as a method for data exfiltration

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: DNS Query To Ufile.io - DNS Client
Query: sourcetype='windows-dns-client' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '3008' and query_name like '%ufile.io%'
